00020  *

00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct List *list;
00028     SECTNUM nSect;
00029  
00030     adfEnvInitDefault();
00031 
00032     /* mount existing device */
00033     hd = adfMountDev( argv[1], FALSE );
00034     if (!hd) {
00035         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00036         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00037     }
00038 
00039     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00040     if (!vol) {
00041         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00042         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00043         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00044     }
00045     
00046     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00047 
00048     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00049     while(list) {
00050         printEntry(list->content);
00051         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00052         list = list->next;
00053     }
00054     freeList(list);
00055 
00056     putchar('\n');
00057 
00058     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"newdir");
00059 
00060     /* cd dir_2 */
00061     nSect = adfChangeDir(vol, "same_hash");
00062 
00063     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00064     while(list) {
00065         printEntry(list->content);
00066         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00067         list = list->next;
00068     }
00069     freeList(list);
00070 
00071     putchar('\n');
00072 
00073     /* not empty */
00074     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "mon.paradox");
00075 
00076     /* first in same hash linked list */
00077     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "file_3a");
00078     /* second */
00079     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_3");
00080     /* last */
00081     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_1a");
00082 
00083     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00084     while(list) {
00085         printEntry(list->content);
00086         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00087         list = list->next;
00088     }
00089     freeList(list);
00090 
00091     putchar('\n');
00092 
00093     adfParentDir(vol);
00094 
00095     adfRemoveEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "mod.And.DistantCall");
00096 
00097     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00098     while(list) {
00099         printEntry(list->content);
00100         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00101         list = list->next;
00102     }
00103     freeList(list);
00104 
00105     putchar('\n');
00106 
00107     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00108 
00109     adfUnMount(vol);
00110     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00111 
00112 
00113     adfEnvCleanUp();
00114 
00115     return 0;
00116 }
